entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
